TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StylusDownEventHandler(object sender, StylusDownEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StylusDownEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StylusDownEventHandler(sender As Object, e As StylusDownEventArgs)
public delegate void StylusDownEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StylusDownEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla el evento así como diversas variaciones, incluido el evento Preview correspondiente.

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event, as well as several variations, including the corresponding Preview event.

summary.span: Además, vuelve a exponer el evento en las clases de elementos base.

span.span: Also re-exposes the event in the base element classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Normalmente, este delegado corresponde a un evento enrutado.Typically, this delegate corresponds to a routed event. Compruebe los datos del evento, en particular el propiedad para determinar el elemento que generó el evento.Check the event data, in particular the property, to determine which element raised the event.
